list_definition.definition: a vehicle on wheels for living in, pulled by a car etc; camper American

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We hitched the caravan up to the car.
(also adjective) a caravan site (= a place where people can stay in their caravans)

list_definition.definition: a group of people travelling together for safety especially across a desert on camels
